extendedInfo.description: Lose yourself in the depths of a tormented psyche and try to find the logic to the night terrors in this haunting text-based multiple-choice game.UPDATE 1.1.1: Added more clues. Minor text change.

reviews.title: Frustrated
reviews.comment: It keeps ending, telling me my fear reached 100%. When I look its no higher than 70. Annoyed with the loop when no matter what I choose I cannot progress.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Though the story is unique and descriptive, it\'s very short and the diction level is only moderate.
reviews.author: Sam Young

reviews.title: Good fun!
reviews.comment: I loved it so much! It was fun to go through a nightmare that fits to what nightmares are actually like!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent, not great.
reviews.comment: When other people say this game is really short, they mean it. The actual game is short it just takes a while to select the right options to finish the game. It is frustrating, the constant restarting and rereading the same story over and over again. Ending is slightly anticlimatic but still worth playing. Not as good as others in the series. Also how is an Irishman outside the walls of Christian society?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: As you figure out the dreams the game becomes more interesting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: Interesting concept but the end was a bit of a let down. If a sequel comes out of give it the extra star
reviews.author: Rachel Cassidy-Cree

reviews.comment: It\'s just insightful. That\'s what this game is. Love the subtle religious/racism controversy back in the 19th century. Despite being short I gave it 5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting and Insightful
reviews.comment: This definitely isn\'t a traditional game, but I really enjoyed it. Its more of a story that you unfold using elements of psychology. Being very intersted in dreams and psychology my self, it really struck a cord with me. However because of how short this game is and the fact that you often have to completely restart the game after mistakes, I can not give it a 5 star rating
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This game was awesome, a challenge but a really good one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome but repetitive
reviews.comment: A brilliant game, but some choices made no sense as to why they were right or wrong. Worth persevering with, very compelling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Talking about nightmares give you the freedom of being silly as much as you want. Because that\'s what nightmares are. You look for a meaning in that sillyness in your dreams and nightmares, and that\'s what you do in this game. Really enjoyed playing it. Sad that it was too short.
reviews.author: Alper Komurlu

reviews.title: Anoying
reviews.comment: It said  I had reached 100 fear when, in fact, I only had 65.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hate this, i didn\'t expect it to scare me that much. I\'m having nightmares daily. Its scary as f**k!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good!
reviews.comment: Took me awhile to get the right order of events but it was easy after that. The ending was a little dissapointing. I didn\'t really see it as a jab at Christians, more of a statement of the creators oppinion and possibly the leading to a sequel? :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is okay... a little bit of this is just plain ridiculous... the constant replaying with no checkpoint or something is a little of a pain. Other than that it was a little fun and had some intrigue to it. So 3 stars, 1 for the game 1 for the idea and 1 for trying. Minus 2 for the constant replaying and retrying with some of the answers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh...
reviews.comment: Did a few chapters then had to stop. Too weird. I reccomend tis to you if you like wonderland-esque storylines. It definately keeps you on your toes. You rly gotta think fast
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Nightmare Maze
reviews.comment: Really have to concentrate!   Love it  hard to stop  before solving it!!!  5 stars * 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good logic, could be much longer tho. Somewhat addictive and enjoyed content.thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmmmm
reviews.comment: It was fun although very repetitive at times. I started enjoying it after having to go through it several times. I don\'t really understand the irshman part. Where was that?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: It still had a lot to be developed but for a start the name is great
reviews.author: A Google User
